numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that the acceptance rate for legacy applicants is much higher than the acceptance rate for non-legacy applicants.
2. I wonder how this data was found.
3. I ask what this data is based on.
4. The article mentions some elite colleges.
5. I ask which colleges are these elite colleges.
6. I ask whether extracurricular activities affect this graph.
7. I ask whether grades affect this graph.
8. I ask whether the graph uses only test scores.
9. This topic relates to me and my community.
10. I am a high school student.
11. I will apply to colleges soon.
12. Both my parents attended a top-20 college in the US.
13. I wonder whether this fact will increase my chance of admission.
14. I understand that this fact will not increase my chance of admission.
15. Both my older siblings applied to this college.
16. Both my older siblings did not get admitted to this college.
17. The headline is: Do family ties really secure the knot for education?
